name: Neo Tempest (gujjaryashas)
description: Neo Tempest is an Endless space shooter game built in less that 3 weeks.We are the Entertainment Arts and Engineering students from The University of Utah.This game was built as our rapid prototype.Our Team consisted of 2 Producers(Benjamin Steele and Rony),2 Engineers(Yashas Gujjar and Siddhartha Ravichandran) and 2 Artists (kamchai Loketrawee and Brock Richards).All of us worked really heard on this game and we are proud of what we accomplised in such little time.Hope you have as much fun playing this game,as we had making it.
